name: MASTERCLASS: Winning with Stage-Gate
content: This top-rated masterclass presented by Innovation Management Expert Bernd Becker is brought to you by the official Stage-GateÂ® company. Learn to master the award-winning business process used by thousands of companies around the world, small and large, including 3M, ABB, Atlas-Copco, BASF, Bosch, Carlsberg, Caterpillar, DuPont, Exxon Chemicals, Governments (state and federal) Guinness, Henkel, Hewlett Packard, ITT Industries, Kraft Foods, LEGO, Mars, Microsoft, Novo-Nordisk, Orkla, Pfizer, Procter & Gamble, Siemens, Swarovski, Velux, Voith Paper, Volvo, VISA and many more.
